decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1985/02, Site Location Plan, 1985/03, Design and Access Statement Received: 23 February 2016 1985/01 Rev. D Received: 01 June 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the approved plans no amplified or other music shall be played outside the hours of 2200hours (Monday to Sunday) for the external seating area as hereby approved.
Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding the approved plans the use of the outside seating for the lower terrace shall cease at 2200hours Monday to Sunday.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and works to beer garden including new decking, beach huts, bin enclosure and fire escape stair access to street area
